name: SwiftyCountry
summary: An enum powered Country that swiftifies your use of Countries in your app
description:
SwiftyCountry provides a convenient way to access all countries and initialize countries. It also makes it easy to check
for a given country or countries. It is easy to switch over also, since its an enum. There is also a bonus feature
where you can get all countries on a given continent and check if a country is part of any given continent. It also
makes it easy to put the countries easily in a UIPickerView and select from it.
